nodes.text: Margo was an Imroosian female who was part of Dryden Vos' concierge aboard First Light in 10 BBY when the yacht traveled to collect stolen coaxium from Tobias Beckett and his crew.

Margo handled all guest amenities aboard the First Light, and welcomed Beckett, Han Solo, and Chewbacca when they arrived. Margo questioned why they came, and Beckett explained that Dryden Vos was expecting him for a meeting. She promised that he'd be with them after dealing with the Regional Governor, and both turned to see the crime lord use his custom kyuzo petars to kill him, ending the meeting. Margo suspected one of the party guests, Kara Safwan, of being up to something, and discreetly blocked the spy's attempts to get deeper into the Dryden Vos' inner circle.

While on board the First Light, Margo wore a black shimmersilk gown and a Ottegan charbake smelt necklace. She had brown eyes, and flinty, chalk-like skin. Margo's homeworld Imroosia was a volcanic planet, but she personally disliked the searing environment and preferred the First Light's cool interior.

Margo was portrayed by Charlotte Louise in the 2018 Star Wars Anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story. Her design was reused concept art of Qi'ra, from when she was originally intended to be an alien. Louise was cast as Margo after the completion of the 2017 sequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. While she was initially hesitant about portraying Margo because of the plaster costume, she ultimately found it relatively easy to adapt once the process started and enjoyed working with the CFX team on the film's set.
